title: Meet lumin
text: Join Lumin at the Sunnova Summit, booth 405, to learn how our smart solutions deliver intelligent energy management and optimize solar + storage performance.
text_mobile: Join Lumin at the Sunnova Summit,

0.meet_main_subtitle: Lumin provides the most versatile platform to generate value from energy assets at the grid edge.

meet_main_rep.text_reviews: I love Lumin because you can really see the fruits of your labor as the company grows, and everyone at the company has each other's backs.

1.meet_meet_text|raw: Lumin® is the pioneer and market leader for responsive load control. The Lumin® platform is an addition to a standard electrical panel and makes ordinary circuits smart and responsive. Lumin® helps homeowners automatically or manually control their home’s microgrid to enhance and protect their investment in energy storage, participate in Demand Response Programs, or manage their energy in real-time to avoid costly service upgrades when adding Electric Vehicle chargers or switching to electric appliances. The Lumin® solution is valued by homeowners, solar + storage installers, utilities, electrical contractors and home builders.
1.meet_meet_text_ceo: A realization that the ubiquitous electrical circuit breaker panel hadn’t changed in 40 years sparked the idea for Lumin.

3.meet_galery_title: But all the hard work is done by these amazing people

4.meet_help_text|raw: Find out how you can add your talent and skills to our team and help us push forward our mission!

5.updates_subtitle|raw: Learn more about our industry and our products with articles from news outlets, thought leadership from our experts, and other resources by Lumin
